mapper.select: SELECT p.portfolio_id, p.member_id, p.stock_id, p.quantity, p.avg_price, p.purchase_date, p.created_at, p.updated_at, s.stock_code, s.stock_name, s.current_price, s.market_type, s.country FROM portfolio p LEFT JOIN STOCK s ON p.stock_id = s.stock_id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId} ORDER BY p.created_at DESC

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO portfolio ( member_id, stock_id, quantity, avg_price, purchase_date, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{memberId}, #{stockId}, #{quantity}, #{avgPurchasePrice}, #{purchaseDate}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE portfolio SET quantity = #{quantity}, avg_price = #{avgPurchasePrice}, updated_at = NOW() WHERE portfolio_id = #{portfolioId}
mapper.select: SELECT COALESCE(SUM(p.quantity * s.current_price), 0) AS total_value FROM portfolio p JOIN STOCK s ON p.stock_id = s.stock_id WHERE p.member_id = #{memberId}
